self_predictions.prediction_summary: Aleksandra believes Liz might win the first two matches, but she will adapt and win the next three by finding Liz's weakness.

Elizabeth Mocek.strength: Super strong, especially in arm strength and back pressure
Elizabeth Mocek.previous_match_summary: Lost to Carolina Patterson easily a year ago, but her technique may have improved since then.

third_party_predictions.speaker: Alex
third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: No clear prediction, but if Leonidas wins, John Brzenk and Scuba would have to pull for second place.

Leonidas Arkona.strength: Very strong, gifted for wrestling with big hands and wrists
Leonidas Arkona.previous_match_summary: Alex showed Leonidas how to pull in 2020, and he has since developed into a top-level strength athlete.

third_party_predictions.speaker: Alex
third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Alex believes Kurdecha will take Jerry's wrist and win if he maintains side pressure and center control.

Alex Kurdecha.strength: Working on side pressure and triceps finishing moves
Alex Kurdecha.previous_match_summary: Not a hooker but a strong presser.

third_party_predictions.speaker: Aleksandra Ozerova
third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Hype match with previous wins on both sides. Justin is very prepared, and it will be competitive.
